name: InstallShieldBuild
helpMarkDown: For help with this task, visit the InstallShield KB article [KB article](https://community.flexera.com/t5/InstallShield-Knowledge-Base/InstallShield-Azure-DevOps-Build-Extension/ta-p/161465).
author: Revenera

inputs.name: AgentLoc
inputs.label: Agent Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Agent Location configured for the Agent pool. Incase of Private Agent (Self Hosted Agent), InstallShield Build task directly build the InstallShield project configured. Incase of Hosted Agent, InstallShield Build task download and install the InstallShield StandAlone Build on the Hosted Agent and then Build the InstallShield project configured.

inputs.name: ISVersion
inputs.label: InstallShield Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the InstallShield version need to be intalled on the hosted agent. If the preferred version cannot be found, the latest version found will be used instead.

inputs.name: SABPath
inputs.label: Path to InstallShield
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full absolute path of Installshield installed Location on the Private Agent. Like - C:\Program Files (x86)\InstallShield\2020 or C:\Program Files (x86)\InstallShield\2020 SAB

inputs.name: ISLicenseServerPort
inputs.label: License Server and Port
inputs.helpMarkDown: Installshield License Server and Port details for the License check out during the build, need to provide in the host:port format. Like - 112.234.215.63:27000 or machineneame.domain.com:27000

messages.InvalidLicServer: Invalid License server details, not as per the format - server:port.
